00017 package WeBWorK::CGI;
00018 
00019 use strict;
00020 use warnings;
00021 
00022 # from http://search.cpan.org/src/LDS/CGI.pm-3.20/cgi_docs.html#subclassing
00023 use vars qw/@ISA $VERSION/;
00024 require CGI;
00025 @ISA = 'CGI';
00026 $VERSION = "0.1";
00027 
00028 $CGI::DefaultClass = __PACKAGE__;
00029 $WeBWorK::CGI::AutoloadClass = 'CGI';
00030 
00031 sub new {
00032     my $self = shift->SUPER::new(@_);
00033     $self->delete_all;
00034     return $self;
00035 }
00036 
00037 1;
